item.description:
Mr. Prashant Bhushan, Senior Advocate at Supreme Court, is involved in the Anna Hazare-led anti corruption movement in India.The chief legislative aim of the movement is to alleviate corruption in the Indian government through the Jan Lokpal Bill.

AID Boston is honored t...o present a talk by Mr Prashant Bhushan, a Supreme Court senior advocate who has filed more than 500 public interest litigation, and a social activist.

Join us in honoring his work towards India's Anti Corruption movement & get the real picture straight from the horse's mouth.

#Admission is free to all.

Visit the page below:
https://www.facebook.com/TheAntiCorruptionMovementInIndia?ref=tn_tnmn

Though we are 64.5 years in independence today, we are way behind in giving independence for many Indians who have never benefited from policies and development of India. In fact, Times of India editorial states that Corruption and Inflation are two reasons, India's growth story may not even materialize.

Our goals for this event are:
-to raise awareness of social and economic change in India and United States,
-to promote greater participation in international dialogue and exchange and, by doing so,
-to strengthen the social and economic change movement locally, nationally and internationally.

'Your support for this event will contribute directly to awareness of social and economic change'.

It is our opportunity to learn and support India Against Corruption movement.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This event is brought to you by AID, MIT & Boston Chapter.

About AID: Association for India's Development is a volunteer movement promoting sustainable, equitable and just development. AID supports grassroots organizations in India and initiates efforts in various interconnected spheres such as agriculture, energy, education, health , livelihoods, natural resources including land and water, women's empowerment and social justice.

Contact AID at : events@aidboston.org
More Information: www.aidboston.org or www.aidindia.org

item.name: A Talk by 'Prashant Bhushan' on the Anti-Corruption Movement in India
